about_the_game:
The First Steps Towards the Unknown

The story of Rune Monsters takes place in the coastal village of Suncrest. It is here that Alex, a young man/woman that has found themselves thrust into a situation that results in their temporary exile, begins their journey. Although eager to finally venture outside of their village for the first time in their life, they soon find themselves embroiled with a conflict that the fate of the world hinges on the conclusion of. Along the way, you’ll meet a variety of characters and monsters, both serving as valuable allies and dangerous opponents.

Features

- A 2.5D aesthetic reminiscent of oldschool games.
- Over a hundred different monsters to battle, collect, and fuse together.
- An engaging story with charming characters in a world full of wonders.
- An old man that loves to walk around in a fish costume?...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 or Radeon HD7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: -d3d11 in steam launch options

short_description: A unique spin of the RPG monster collecting genre; taking inspiration from the classics. With over a hundred different monsters to collect, there exists a number of possibilities to choose from as you explore a world full of adventure, and untold dangers.
